name: Radio Drift
description:
Radio Drift GMTK 2020 Submission - "Out of Control"

Preferred version:  Desktop. Some sounds are missing in the web version.

Stay in blue towers' range to control the car. When you go too far from them, the last input is kept and the car keeps going by itself.  While in green towers' range, you can activate/deactivate obstacles each time you press space.

Controls:
